Package com.github.mavolin.maxon.converter

Class DateFormatConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mavolin.maxon.converter.DateFormatConfiguration
  • public class DateFormatConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    The DateFormatConfiguration is used by Maxon to convert date and time objects of the new java.time package to and from JSON.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DateFormatConfiguration()
      Instantiates a new Date format configuration.

      • setLocalTimeFormatter

        public void setLocalTimeFormatter​(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter localTimeFormatter)
        Sets the DateTimeFormatter for LocalTime to the passed one . If the passed DateTimeFormatter is null, the default date format will be used.
        Parameters:
        localTimeFormatter - the DateTimeFormatter
